A children's book series that follows the adventures of a young rainbow-colored zebra named Raya, who learns about acceptance and the importance of being different.
A social media campaign aimed at promoting diversity and inclusion, featuring images and stories of real-life rainbow-colored zebras and their unique experiences.
A mobile app that allows users to create and share their own rainbow-colored zebra designs, fostering creativity and self-expression.
A wildlife documentary exploring the behavior and habits of rainbow-colored zebras in their natural habitat, shedding light on their unique adaptations and survival strategies.
A fashion line featuring rainbow-colored zebra prints and patterns, promoting individuality and boldness in fashion.
